attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Following the expenses scandal, the public have no confidence in the current members of the House of Commons. Had they been in other areas of public service, such as the armed services, they would not only have to pay back the overpayments, they would have been thrown out with a dishonourable discharge and no pension after serving time in the correctional centre at Colchester. This Government  too deserves a dishonourable discharge.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
